name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker leveraged a command and scripting interpreter to execute malicious scripts, with potential data exfiltration as a consequence.

action--d4e95acb-fb05-4a87-9723-ff2ae13f.name: Terminate malicious process
action--d4e95acb-fb05-4a87-9723-ff2ae13f.description: Identify and terminate any malicious processes running on the host.

action--b18e660d-1f57-4878-a9b1-97e6f283.name: Isolate infected host
action--b18e660d-1f57-4878-a9b1-97e6f283.description: Block incoming traffic from the identified malicious IP address.

loop--6d99f4f5-5d74-4af9-bb5a-ea70a5f4b6.name: Run malware scan until clean
loop--6d99f4f5-5d74-4af9-bb5a-ea70a5f4b6.description: Perform a comprehensive malware scan repeatedly until the system is clean.

scan_is_clean.description: Flag indicating if the scan has cleared the malware.

action--6d99f4f5-5d74-4af9-bb5a-ea70a5f4.name: Perform malware scan
action--6d99f4f5-5d74-4af9-bb5a-ea70a5f4.description: Run a comprehensive malware scan on the affected system.
